About this item

  • Full size keyboard for users who can't do without the numeric keypad in games or during daily use.
  • Now with the exclusive Lunar White paint to bring even more style to your setup.
  • Keycaps made with double shot injection resulting in lasting captions.
  • Compatible with RGB lighting control software and Macro creation.
  • Redragon Chroma Mk.II Single Per Key RGB Lighting Bringing More Brightness to Your Setup.
